chunk:
Liz Earle Superskin Alt-Retinol Booster

Brand: Liz Earle

Category: Serums & Essences

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Aqua (water), Glycerin, Propanediol, Sambucus nigra (elderberry) fruit extract, Xanthan gum, Kappaphycus alvarezii (red algae) extract, Stevia rebaudiana leaf/stem extract, Caesalpinia spinosa fruit extract, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium benzoate, Citric acid, Benzyl alcohol, Dehydroacetic acid.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
